title: Crystal acorn

properties.value: Crystal acorns are seeds used in the Farming skill. At level 74 Farming, crystal acorns may be planted in plant pots with a gardening trowel and watered to become crystal saplings. They can be obtained as a reward from the Elven Crystal Chest, by catching crystal implings or from trading crystal weapon, armour, and tool seeds to Pennant in Prifddinas. Pennant exchanges one acorn in return for any one seed.

Crystal acorn

Item ID23661

Crystal acorns are seeds used in the Farming skill. At level 74 Farming, crystal acorns may be planted in plant pots with a gardening trowel and watered to become crystal saplings. They can be obtained as a reward from the Elven Crystal Chest, by catching crystal implings or from trading crystal weapon, armour, and tool seeds to Pennant in Prifddinas. Pennant exchanges one acorn in return for any one seed.

After planting the sapling in a crystal tree patch found in Prifddinas and waiting for it to fully grow, which takes about eight hours, the plant will grow into a crystal tree which can be cut to yield crystal shards. Planting the crystal sapling yields 126 experience, and checking its health gives 13,240 experience.

Harvesting crystal trees grants 8-16 crystal shards, depending on the type of compost used. Ultracompost is the best for this. Magic secateurs have no effect.[1] Players can also receive bird nests after chopping the tree down.

[[File:Crystal acorn detail.png|130px|left]]
'''Crystal acorns''' are [[seed]]s used in the [[Farming]] skill. At level 74 [[Farming]], crystal acorns may be planted in [[Empty plant pot|plant pots]] with a [[gardening trowel]] and watered to become [[crystal sapling]]s. They can be obtained as a reward from the [[Elven Crystal Chest]], by catching [[crystal impling]]s or from trading [[crystal weapon seed|crystal weapon]], [[crystal armour seed|armour]], and [[crystal tool seed|tool seeds]] to [[Pennant]] in [[Prifddinas]]. Pennant exchanges one acorn in return for any one seed.

After planting the sapling in a crystal tree patch found in [[Prifddinas]] and waiting for it to fully grow, which takes about eight hours, the plant will grow into a [[crystal tree]] which can be cut to yield [[crystal shard]]s. Planting the crystal sapling yields 126 experience, and checking its health gives 13,240 experience.

Harvesting crystal trees grants 8-16 [[crystal shard]]s, depending on the type of [[compost]] used. [[Ultracompost]] is the best for this. [[Magic secateurs]] have no effect.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1158691826775265282|date=6 August 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/8JbiN|archivedate=28 May 2020|quote=[Does using magic secateurs increase the amount of crystal shards from harvesting crystal tree?] No, the secateurs don't help with that. Compost does.}} Players can also receive [[bird nest]]s after chopping the tree down.
